channel.title: Hello, I'm Brent from Mometic!
channel.description:
Feels a bit like group therapy (which I need). Anyway been grinding on Mometic (stock market scanning tool)for 5 years and have all the stories. The pandemic has been good for business, but getting ready to do major overhaul.
Started out with IOS, moved to Android, then web and now have another platform to hopefully get rid of all prior.
Welcome thoughts and building new relationships. Cheers.

item.title: Hello, I'm Brent from Mometic!

item.description:
Yes - apologies for not including.
